targets.rawSql:
SELECT date, country, latitude, longitude, sum (deaths) as total_deaths
FROM world
GROUP BY date, country, latitude, longitude
ORDER BY date DESC, country ASC;

SELECT date as time, 100 * cases / (SELECT sum(cases) FROM world WHERE date = numerator_world.date) as percentage
FROM world numerator_world
WHERE country = 'US'
GROUP BY date, cases
ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT date as time, 100 * deaths / (SELECT sum(deaths) FROM world WHERE date = numerator_world.date) as percentage
FROM world numerator_world
WHERE country = 'US'
GROUP BY date, deaths
ORDER BY date DESC;

panels.description: Sweden has elected not to do social distancing and is instead aiming for herd immunity.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT date as "time", sum (cases) AS global_cases
FROM world
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT date as "time", sum (cases) as us_cases
FROM world
WHERE country = 'US'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

panels.title: Global vs US Cases

targets.rawSql:
SELECT date as "time", sum (deaths) as global_deaths
FROM world
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT date as "time", sum (deaths) as us_deaths
FROM world
WHERE country = 'US'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT date, sum(cases)
FROM states
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date DESC

SELECT date, sum(deaths)
FROM states
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date DESC

panels.description: Sweden has elected not to do social distancing and is instead aiming for herd immunity.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT date as "time", sum (cases) / 10.23 as sweden_cases
FROM world
WHERE country = 'Sweden'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT date as "time", sum (cases) / 330 as us_cases
FROM world
WHERE country = 'US'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

panels.title: Sweden vs US Cases (per capita)

panels.description: Sweden has elected not to do social distancing and is instead aiming for herd immunity.

SELECT date as "time", sum (deaths) / 10.23 as sweden_cases
FROM world
WHERE country = 'Sweden'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT date as "time", sum (deaths) / 330 as us_cases
FROM world
WHERE country = 'US'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

panels.title: Sweden vs US Deaths (per capita)

panels.description: South Korea and the United States detected their first case on the same day.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT date as "time", sum (cases) / 51.64 as south_korea_cases
FROM world
WHERE country = 'Korea, South'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT date as "time", sum (cases) / 330 as us_cases
FROM world
WHERE country = 'US'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

panels.title: South Korea vs US Cases (per capita)

panels.description: South Korea and the United States detected their first case on the same day.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT date as "time", sum (deaths) / 51.64 as south_korea_cases
FROM world
WHERE country = 'Korea, South'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT date as "time", sum (deaths) / 330 as us_cases
FROM world
WHERE country = 'US'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

panels.title: South Korea vs US Deaths (per capita)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT date, sum(deaths) / sum(cases) * 100 AS mortality
FROM states
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date DESC

SELECT date as "time", sum (cases) as total_cases
FROM states
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT date as "time", sum (deaths) as total_deaths
FROM states
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT date as "time", sum (cases) as total_cases, sum (deaths) as total_deaths
FROM states
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT date as "time", 'NorCal' AS region, total_cases
FROM northern_california
GROUP BY date, region, total_cases
ORDER BY date

SELECT date as "time", 'SoCal' AS region, total_cases
FROM southern_california
GROUP BY date, region, total_cases
ORDER BY date

SELECT date as "time", 'NorCal' AS region, total_deaths
FROM northern_california
GROUP BY date, region, total_deaths
ORDER BY date

SELECT date as "time", 'SoCal' AS region, total_deaths
FROM southern_california
GROUP BY date, region, total_deaths
ORDER BY date

SELECT date as "time", 'NorCal' AS region, total_cases
FROM northern_california
GROUP BY date, region, total_cases
ORDER BY date

SELECT date as "time", 'NorCal' AS region, total_deaths
FROM northern_california
GROUP BY date, region, total_deaths
ORDER BY date

SELECT date as "time", 'NorCal' AS region, total_cases
FROM northern_california
GROUP BY date, region, total_cases
ORDER BY date

SELECT date as "time", 'New York' AS region, sum(cases) as total_cases
FROM counties
WHERE county = 'New York City' AND state = 'New York'
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT date as "time", 'NorCal' AS region, total_deaths
FROM northern_california
GROUP BY date, region, total_deaths
ORDER BY date

SELECT date as "time", 'New York' AS region, sum(deaths) as total_deaths
FROM counties
WHERE county = 'New York City' AND state = 'New York'
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date

SELECT date as "time", state, deaths
FROM states
WHERE state IN ('Louisiana', 'Georgia', 'Michigan', 'Florida')
GROUP BY time, state, deaths
ORDER BY time, state ASC;

SELECT date as "time", state, (deaths / (SELECT sum(population2019) FROM population WHERE states.state = population.state)) as value
FROM states
WHERE state IN ('Louisiana', 'Georgia', 'Michigan', 'Florida')
GROUP BY time, state, deaths
ORDER BY time, state ASC;

SELECT date as "time", state, cases
FROM states
WHERE state IN ($state_picker)
GROUP BY time, state, cases
ORDER BY time, state ASC;

SELECT date as "time", state, cases
FROM states
WHERE state IN ($state_picker)
GROUP BY time, state, cases
ORDER BY time, state ASC;

SELECT date as "time", state, (cases / (SELECT sum(population2019) FROM population WHERE states.state = population.state)) as cases_per_capita
FROM states
WHERE state IN ($state_picker)
GROUP BY time, state, cases
ORDER BY time, state ASC;

SELECT date as "time", state, deaths
FROM states
WHERE state in ($state_picker)
GROUP BY time, state, deaths
ORDER BY time, state ASC;

SELECT date as "time", state, deaths
FROM states
WHERE state in ($state_picker)
GROUP BY time, state, deaths
ORDER BY time, state ASC;

SELECT date as "time", state, (deaths / (SELECT sum(population2019) FROM population WHERE states.state = population.state)) as deaths_per_capita
FROM states
WHERE state in ($state_picker)
GROUP BY time, state, deaths
ORDER BY time, state ASC;

SELECT time_bucket('1 day', date) AS time,
       state,
       round (100 * (cases - lag(cases, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY state ORDER BY date)) / (1 + (lag(cases, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY state ORDER BY date)))) AS rate_of_change
FROM states
WHERE states.state IN ($state_picker);

panels.title: State by State Cases Rate of Change

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time_bucket('1 day', date) AS time,
       state,
       round (100 * (deaths - lag(deaths, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY state ORDER BY date)) / (1 + (lag(deaths, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY state ORDER BY date)))) AS rate_of_change
FROM states
WHERE states.state IN ($state_picker);

panels.title: State by State Deaths Rate of Change

targets.rawSql:
SELECT counties.date as "time", sum (counties.cases) as trump_cases
FROM counties
WHERE counties.fips IN (SELECT fips FROM trump_counties)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT counties.date as "time", sum (counties.cases) as clinton_cases
FROM counties
WHERE counties.fips IN (SELECT fips FROM clinton_counties)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT counties.date as "time",
       sum (counties.cases) / 
            (SELECT sum(population2019)
             FROM population
             WHERE population.fips IN (SELECT fips FROM trump_counties)
            ) as trump_per_capita_cases
FROM counties
WHERE counties.fips IN (SELECT fips FROM trump_counties)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT counties.date as "time",
       sum (counties.cases) / 
            (SELECT sum(population2019)
             FROM population
             WHERE population.fips IN (SELECT fips FROM clinton_counties)
            ) as clinton_per_capita_cases
FROM counties
WHERE counties.fips IN (SELECT fips FROM clinton_counties)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date DESC;

panels.title: Trump vs Clinton County Cases (per capita)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT counties.date as "time", sum (counties.deaths) as trump_deaths
FROM counties
WHERE counties.fips IN (SELECT fips FROM trump_counties)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT counties.date as "time", sum (counties.deaths) as clinton_deaths
FROM counties
WHERE counties.fips IN (SELECT fips FROM clinton_counties)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT counties.date as "time",
       sum (counties.deaths) / 
            (SELECT sum(population2019)
             FROM population
             WHERE population.fips IN (SELECT fips FROM trump_counties)
            ) as trump_per_capita_deaths
FROM counties
WHERE counties.fips IN (SELECT fips FROM trump_counties)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT counties.date as "time",
       sum (counties.deaths) / 
            (SELECT sum(population2019)
             FROM population
             WHERE population.fips IN (SELECT fips FROM clinton_counties)
            ) as clitnon_per_capita_deaths
FROM counties
WHERE counties.fips IN (SELECT fips FROM clinton_counties)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date DESC;

panels.title: Trump vs Clinton County Deaths (per capita)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time_bucket('30d', date) AS time,
       (100 * sum(unemployed) / sum (population)) AS value
FROM employment
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time_bucket('30d', date) AS time,
       (100 * sum(unemployed) / sum (population)) AS value
FROM employment
WHERE employment.fips IN (SELECT fips FROM counties WHERE counties.state = 'California')
GROUP BY time;

SELECT time_bucket('30d', date) AS time,
       (100 * sum(unemployed) / sum (population)) AS value
FROM employment
WHERE employment.fips IN (SELECT fips FROM counties WHERE state IN ($state_picker))
GROUP BY time;

SELECT time_bucket('30d', date) AS time,
       (100 * sum(unemployed) / sum (population)) AS value
FROM employment
WHERE employment.fips IN (SELECT fips FROM battleground_counties)
GROUP BY time;

SELECT state, date as time, cases
FROM states
WHERE state in ($state_picker)
GROUP BY state, date, cases
ORDER BY state ASC, date DESC;

SELECT state, date as time, deaths
FROM states
WHERE state IN ($state_picker)
GROUP BY state, time, deaths
ORDER BY time DESC, state ASC;

SELECT state, date, cases, deaths
FROM states
WHERE date >= current_date - interval '10' day and
      state IN ($state_picker)
GROUP BY state, date, cases, deaths
ORDER BY state ASC, date DESC;

panels.title: Table of Cases and Deaths by State

targets.rawSql:
SELECT state, county, date, cases, deaths
FROM counties
WHERE date >= current_date - interval '10' day and
      state IN ($state_picker)
GROUP BY state, county, date, cases, deaths
ORDER BY state ASC, date DESC, county ASC;

panels.title: Table of Cases and Deaths by State and County

targets.rawSql:
SELECT date, 
       state, 
       cases, 
       deaths, 
       (cases / (SELECT sum(population2019) from population WHERE state = population.state)) AS cases_per_capita,
       (deaths / (SELECT sum(population2019) from population WHERE state = population.state)) AS deaths_per_capita
FROM states
WHERE date >= current_date - interval '3' day
GROUP BY state, date, cases, deaths
ORDER BY date DESC, cases_per_capita DESC;

panels.title: Table of Cases and Deaths (All States)

list.definition: SELECT state FROM states ORDER BY state ASC
list.label: State
list.name: state_picker
list.query: SELECT state FROM states ORDER BY state ASC
